entry.title: Scott® Essential Universal High Capacity - Hard Roll Towel (12 x 1000')
entry.summary:
Vendor: KIMBERLY-CLARK
Type: Hand Paper
Price: 190.69

Kimberly-Clark Corporation™ Scott® Essential Universal High Capacity Hard Roll Towel reduces maintenance time, run-outs and complaints with this long-lasting roll and provides a reliable balance of efficiency, performance and value. If you're looking for high-capacity commercial paper towels compatible with most universal roll towel dispensers, these are an excellent choice for your business. These absorbent commercial paper towels are designed for efficient general-purpose cleaning and drying, so your employees and guests will use less, saving you money. Bulk paper towels come in small cases for easy storage and handling. The product has dimensions of 8"x1000' and comes in a case of 12.

 Qty/case 12 rolls
Length/roll 1000'
Ply 1
Colour White

entry.title: Scott® Essential Universal High Capacity - Hard Roll Towel (6 x 950')

Vendor: KIMBERLY-CLARK
Type: Hand Paper
Price: 112.60

Kimberly-Clark Professional™ Scott® Essential Universal High Capacity Hard Roll Towel provides a reliable balance of efficiency, performance and value. Reduce maintenance time, run-outs and complaints with Scott® Essential Hard Roll Paper Towels. The roll has a core size of 1.75" and is compatible with a variety of Kimberly-Clark Professional™ dispensers. Plus the big rolls are designed to last, even in your busy restroom or break room. These absorbent recycled paper towels are designed for efficient general-purpose cleaning and drying, so your employees and guests may use less, saving you money. They also come in space-saving cases for easy storage and handling at your business. The product has dimensions of 8"x950' and comes in a case of 6 rolls.

 Qty/case 6 rolls
Length/roll 950'
Ply 1
Colour White

Core Size 1.75"

entry.title: Scott® Essential Universal Plus - Hard Roll Towel (12 x 425')
entry.summary:
Vendor: KIMBERLY-CLARK
Type: Hand Paper
Price: 126.75

Kimberly-Clark Professional™ Scott® Essential Universal Plus Hard Roll Towel is 1ply and provides a reliable balance of efficiency, performance and value. Drying is one of the most important steps in the hand washing process, and how you dry matters. Forced air dryers and hot air dryers can take two or even three times as long to use as a paper towel, and studies show that, while the overall cost per use is comparable, the likelihood of spreading germs is greatly reduced with the use of absorbent, single-use drying towels, such as white Scott® Essential (formerly Kleenex) Hard Roll Paper Towels. Germ counts are significantly lower following the use of a touch-free paper towel dispenser (like the compatible Sanitouch Hard Roll Paper Towel Dispenser)—as much as a 200% decrease when compared with using either jet or hot air dryers. And, rather than blowing germs into the air during use, the paper towels are thrown neatly away. The rolls offer terrific hand drying performance, so your guests will waste less. A healthy workplace is a happy workplace and providing high-quality Scott® Essential (formerly Kleenex) Hard Roll commercial paper towels to your guests, clients and employees is one important piece of the puzzle. It's the same Kleenex® quality, now Scott® branded. The product has dimensions of 8"x425' and comes in a case of 12 rolls.

 Qty/case 12 rolls
Length/roll 425'
Ply 1
Colour White
Roll Height 8"

DuraPlus® Hardwound Paper Towel is bright white and soft to the hand. The towels deliver unprecedented quality and value. They have a universal core designed to fit virtually every dispenser size. Ideal for high-traffic areas, these towels require fewer changeouts, reduce labour and provide better control of paper waste and cost. The product has dimensions of 7.8"x350' and comes in a case of 12 rolls. Made in Canada.

Rolls per case 12

entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES

Price: 47.10

Cascades PRO Select™ roll paper towels go the distance. The high capacity, absorbent roll towels reduce maintenance time and run outs. Made with 100% recycled fiber, these roll towels also reduce impact on the environment. Combining value and affordability, this is the economical choice for cleaning needs. Perfect for use in high-traffic venues across industrial, retail, foodservice and education venues.

  • Long-lasting rolls minimize maintenance costs while maximizing service
  • Embossing enhances hand feel and maximizes absorbency; fewer towels are used per hand dry
  • Made from 100% recycled fibres, with a minimum of 50% post-consumer material and are certified Green Seal(R)

  • A perfect combination of quality and value

entry.title: Tandem® Signature™ T116 - Hand Towels - White (6 x 775')
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Hand Paper
Price: 63.15

Cascades PRO Perform® roll towels for Tandem® are designed to work exclusively with Cascades PRO Tandem® electronic and mechanical no-touch dispensers and are ideal for use across education, industrial facilities, retailers, and foodservice venues to encourage handwashing hygiene. Made from 100% recycled fiber, with a minimum of 50% post-consumer fiber, they have earned Green Seal, UL and Green-e certifications and they exceed EPA comprehensive procurement guidelines. We're covering all bases with these strong and absorbent roll towels to effectively reduce the spread of germs.

This product meets the Green Seal® Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 50% post-consumer material.

  • Large rolls mean fewer service checks and reduced maintenance costs
  • Embossing enhances hand feel and maximizes absorbency
  • Certified UL ECOLOGO(R) 175 and Green Seal Certified(R)

Colour  White
Roll type Standard
Ply 1
Roll Length 775'
Rolls/case 6

entry.summary:
Vendor: TORK
Type: Hand Paper
Price: 86.82

Premium, quick-absorbing, thicker 2-ply paper towel with improved softness and strength that feels more like cloth. Designed specifically for the Tork Elevation® Matic® Hand Towel Roll Dispensers, this high-end Tork Premium Soft Hand Towel offers a truly best-in-class product for no-touch, hygienic dispensing systems. Ideal for Class-A office buildings and upscale dining facilities.

Provides 726 towels/roll for the Tork Matic, 862 towels/roll with Intuition 8“ setting to meet medium capacity needs. One-at-a-time dispensing for reduced consumption and increased hygiene With high-performance towels customers use fewer, resulting in greater cost savings.
